name: @itk-wasm/image-io
description: Input and output for scientific and medical image file formats.

scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.test:browser: npm run test:browser:chrome && npm run test:browser:firefox
scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run build:node && npm run build:browser && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:browser: shx mkdir -p dist/web-workers && shx cp node_modules/itk-wasm/dist/core/web-workers/bundles/* ./dist/web-workers/ && esbuild --bundle --format=esm --outfile=./dist/index.js ./src/index.ts
scripts.copyShoelaceAssets: shx mkdir -p test/browser/demo-app/public && shx cp -r node_modules/@shoelace-style/shoelace/dist/assets test/browser/demo-app/public/
scripts.build:demo: npm run copyShoelaceAssets && vite -c build/vite.config.js build
